question_text:
Question 57 
 
[Fluid Mechanics : Flow Through Pipes]
A 500 m long water distribution pipeline 
P
 with diameter 1.0 m, is used to convey 
3
0.1 m /s
  of flow. A 
new pipeline 
Q
, with the same length and flow rate, is to replace 
P
. The friction factors for 
P
 and 
Q
 are 
0.04 and 0.01, respectively. The diameter of the pipeline 
Q
 (in meters) is ______________ (rounded off 
to 2 decimal places). 
Ans. 0.70 to 0.80
